name: Senior Frontend Developer
description:
Are you an experienced Frontend Developer who wants to participate in creating a friendly and trusted platform based on modern technologies and innovations? Are you willing to join a quickly growing, product-oriented company while working remotely from home? Then welcome to Siren Group! By joining Siren, you become a part of an innovative team with an ethical approach to business relations.

Siren Group is a fast-growing online advertising company offering a unique combination of technology and human capital. We are developing our product HomeBuddy.com focusing on home improvement services in the U.S., where our top priority is outstanding, high-quality service and attention to people. Being already a very successful fast-growing firm with a strong trajectory, we are aiming for even more explosive expansion! Our success will be achieved through a highly professional and creative team, which we are actively developing.

Our head office is located in Switzerland, but we work with clients and employees all over the world.

We are searching for an experienced Senior Frontend Developer to join our HomeBuddy team. We have a solid technical team ready to help you grow professionally. In our work we strive to implement and use modern tools, methodologies, and approaches that can improve our processes.​

What You Will Be Doing:

  • Development of a new flagship product - HomeBuddy;
  • Participate in the full cycle of developing new solutions - from design to launch and further support;
  • Participate in the development of new functionality for already made solutions.

About You:

  • Highly self-motivated and results-oriented team player;
  • At least three years of experience with JavaScript;
  • Understanding the principles of OOP and Functional Programming, SOLID;
  • Excellent knowledge of HTML and SCSS;
  • Excellent knowledge of Typescript;
  • Experience with React/Next.js;
  • Development Experience of SPA, SSR;
  • Understanding the principles of HTTP, WS, REST;
  • Experience with UI kit;
  • Ability to profile and debug your code;
  • Strong attention to detail;
  • Ability to write clean, testable, and well-documented code;
  • A very good level of English (especially written), Upper-Intermediate +. Fluent Russian is essential.

Nice to have:

  • Desire and experience in writing tests (TDD);
  • Experience working with bundlers Webpack/Parcel;
  • Experience with Redux;
  • Knowledge of the principles of building a reliable architecture;
  • Development experience in any other programming language.

What We Offer:

We have different perks and benefits, but we also can offer you a supportive work environment powered by a fantastic team!

  • Competitive compensation according to your skills, experience, and professional accomplishments;
  • Generous paid vacation, sick leave, and paid holidays;
  • 100% remote work, allowing working and traveling;
  • Flexible work hours, when it is convenient to plan your working and personal time;
  • Work in one of the most dynamic and fastest-growing industries;
  • Ambitious and challenging tasks with a high degree of responsibility;
  • Multicultural environment;
  • Supportive, friendly, and professional team, which you can always rely on;
  • An allowance program for compensation of expenses for fitness activities and the purchase of technical equipment;
  • Paid training (school, events, conferences).
